definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: He should not have walked those two miles to the fight.
sentences.chinese: 他不应该在斗拳之前走那两哩路。

definition: to fight or argue on a blogging site (netspeak)
to have a fist fight/fist fight/brawl
master of martial arts, in former times often employed by a landlord to teach fighting skills and guard the house/(fig.) sb who arrogantly and condescendingly lectures others
(of a performer) to put on a show at an outdoor venue (temple fair, marketplace etc)/(fig.) to enhance sb's reputation/to make a name for oneself
variant of 打把勢|打把势[da3 ba3 shi5]
to perform magic/to do magic tricks/prestidigitation
